verbs.description: President Trump [V: will] name several sports notables , including Bill Belichick , to his sports council .
[ARG0: President Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: name] [ARG1: several sports notables , including Bill Belichick ,] [ARG2: to his sports council] .
President Trump will name [ARG2: several sports notables] , [V: including] [ARG1: Bill Belichick] , to his sports council .
